org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class BlockPoolManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.BlockPoolManager

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 class BlockPoolManager
extends Object
    Manages the BPOfferService objects for the data node. Creation, removal, starting, stopping, shutdown on BPOfferService objects must be done via APIs in this class.
